name: GlowBells
description:
A little physics platformer where your goal is to climb up from the undergrowth into the clouds!

This was made for the 48hr game jam "PB & Jam 2021" (part of the 2021 NZ games festival) and was developed solo, on-site, completely from scratch.
I chose to focus on the art & world more than gameplay, and I'm glad I did because I really enjoyed designing and creating the art for this game.

Enjoy!

Created by Jack Huygens (Gaugepunk Games)
